name: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Kaiserhof Wien

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is in a great location. The staff were very helpful. The breakfast was all you wanted and the room comfortable. recommended to all and would stay there again.
reviews.title: recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got a good deal for this hotel through the 'hotel club' website at a lot less than expedia etc. The location is extremely convenient, approx 5 minutes walk to the underground, yet it seemed to be in a quiet street.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay

likes.liked: — Quality of room and convenience to underground/sights.

reviews.text: The room and bathroom were immaculate and well fitted out. Breakfast was a very enjoyable experience with a wide range of foods on offer.
reviews.title: Most enjoyable hotel !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only drawback was the inadequate air conditioning system. We stayed on the 4th floor in September (weather not that hot) and the thermostat could only be altered by 3 degrees which wasnt nearly enough. If it had been the height of summer, then we would have had to move room.
reviews.title: Great hotel, nice staff, good position for city centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other than that, we would definately stay here again. The staff were particularly friendly and spoke excellent English.
reviews.title: A Little Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I researched a number of hotels in Vienna using Trip Advisor before selecting the Kaiserhof. It turned out to be a perfect choice for us.
reviews.title: A Perfect Choice

aka: Best Western Premier Kaiserhof Wien Hotel Vienna
description: The KAISERHOF was built in 1896 (last renovation 2012). The familiar hotel (private running hotel) is located in a quiet area, centrally located in the heart of Vienna. The State Opera House, St Stephans Cathedral and the Naschmarkt are nearby. Bus, Tram and Metro-Station nearby.The natural friendliness of the staff, best quality service, and real love of detail give the hotel a uniquely attractive ambience. Tradition and the modernity combine here with true Austrian charme!Breakfast-Buffet also offers GLUTEN- and LACTOSE-FREE products. 74 rooms on 6 floors. Categories: Classic, Superior, Luxury, Junior-Suites, Suites and special ANTI-ALLERGY Rooms are available. Fee W-Lan, public garage nearby. All rooms are equipped with aircondition and tea-& coffeemaker, minibar. Small Wellness-Area.
